data.eml:eml: A key to the Australian Sarcophagidae (Diptera) with special emphasis on Sarcophaga (sensu lato)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dowton, Mark, Pape, Thomas (2013): A key to the Australian Sarcophagidae (Diptera) with special emphasis on Sarcophaga (sensu lato). Zootaxa 3680 (1): 148-189, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3680.1.11
